name: Crowd Surfers
description:
Crowd Surfers is an experimental 48 hours IGDA eJam game following the theme 'celebration'.


The goal of the game is to carry as many crowd surfers from the concert as possible to the back without dropping them!
Players control the arms/crowd by making them follow the mouse cursor. In addition to this, players have to activate the chunk of the crowd they want to control.

CONTROLS

Q, W, E, A, S, D       - activate different chunks of the crowd
Mouse cursor          - control arms 

On a last note: Good job to all submissions and good luck!
